txt.en: You have collected fake Moor-boar Beer

You have been tasked with delivering unpleasant things to Inn League Members in need of assistance, something only a terrible [placeholder] would do.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'I've received a different sort of orders from Jónar, the head of this here society. He hates the Inn League so much that he has assigned me a rather different task than my Inn League neighbour there. Shh, he mustn't hear us!

'One of my poor, traitorous fellow dwarves is far away in Forochel, the frozen north-lands. He is at a dwarf-keep called Zigilgund and is a zealous member of the Inn League; he spurns the Ale Association. I do not want him to infect other dwarves with his folly, so we shall play a little trick on him.

'He wishes to complete the challenge by drinking Moor-boar Beer from The Prancing Pony. But that is not what he'll get, oh no. We'll be delivering him a Toad's Tongue Ale. I wonder if he'll be able to tell the difference between a boar and a toad at the moment of truth....'
The Floating Log is in Frogmorton in the Shire.\n\nYou should get a pint of Toad's Tongue Ale from Ponto Hopsbloom, the tavern keep at The Floating Log.
'One Toad's Tongue Ale, coming up! This is a local favourite, but no one from outside of Frogmorton ever seems particularly keen to order this. I cannot imagine why.'
Lófi is at Zigilgund in Forochel, far to the frozen north.\n\nYou should bring the fake Moor-boar Beer, which is actually Toad's Tongue Ale in disguise, to Lófi before it is too late.
'You must get the fake Moor-boar Beer from The Floating Log in Frogmorton. Lófi will never have his last beer if I can help it.'

'What have we here? I am very excited! I can toast with my good brother at last, and we'll complete the Inn League Challenge once and for all.'

Lófi drinks deep of the Toad's Tongue Ale, and his nose wrinkles a bit when he lowers his mug.

'That was not what I expected at all! It was a little slimier and less furry than I expected, if you know what I mean. I thought a Boar-inspired beer would put some hair on my beard, but instead...I do not know what to make of that.'
Collect fake Moor-boar Beer from The Floating Log
Bring the fake Moor-boar Beer to Lófi in Forochel
